1.5 inch wide label printer; driver by Mark Whitis
Tested OK by driver author on Manufacturer supplied printer. Just remember that most software expecting an 8-1/2x11 page (not a mailing label) will print in the UL corner of the page without proper configuration - adjust margins so it prints in the LL corner or adjust page size. Note that pbm2lwxl is not a ghostscript internal driver; it is a filter program which will take PBM output from ghostscript and translate it into the printer's native language.

Consumables/Refills: thermal; special labels
